profile.description: Passionate about new technologies and especially the CSS and Javascript ecosystem. Currently a Ruby on Rails student. My purpose is to learn as much as possible about programming and web development.

experience.first-job-description: I have developed basic/intermediate level projects with HTML and CSS languages.
experience.secong-job-description: I am level B2, intermediate/advanced, in the English language, I have been attending English classes intensively and constantly for approximately one year. I can start conversations in English on basic topics or related to music fluently but not natively.
